title: Revisiting Dulcé Sloan's Case for Making Juneteenth a National Holiday
itunes:title: Revisiting Dulcé Sloan's Case for Making Juneteenth a National Holiday
description:
From June 2020, Dulcé Sloan clarifies common misconceptions about how Juneteenth came about and why it should be a national holiday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
